text: Ko Wen-je (; born 6 August 1959) is a Taiwanese surgeon and independent politician. Ko was the Mayor of Taipei from 2014 to 2022.Independent Is Elected Taipei Mayor as Taiwan's Governing Party Falters Before becoming the mayor, he was a doctor at the National Taiwan University Hospital. He was also a professor at National Taiwan University College of Medicine. He is a candidate for President of the Republic of China in the 2024 election. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Surgeons Category:Political commentators Category:Taiwanese educators Category:Mayors of Taipei
title: Ko Wen-je
